Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic epistolary text on recto (29 short ll.) and verso (2 ll.). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Letter from Psenanupis to Petearsemtheus son of Panobchunis. Date. year 26 Mechir 4 [of Ptol. Soter II. restored] = B.C. 88 Feb 16." Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Published by Depauw, The Demotic Letter (2006), 30 with bibliography. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (623) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/623)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, fractured, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Binding: self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
